description: questions from which to construct the Fall 2017 quizzes in CS4472a

questions.question: To illustrate the relation between testing and software design, we will look at the programming technique ANSWER
An important concept we will look at related to the question of when has one done enough testing is ANSWER
It is easy to make up test inputs, but it can be tricky to know what the right output for a given input should be.  This is refered to as the ANSWER problem
Testing is generally about finding errors that have already been made.  This course also covers the topic of ANSWER, which is about trying to prevent errors from being made in the first place.
The first testing framework for Ruby that we are looking at is called ANSWER
The first tool for checking code quality for programs written in Ruby is ANSWER, which is described as a code smell detector.
The number of quizzes CS4472 will have this semester is ANSWER
The number of weekly practices that CS4472 will have this semester is ANSWER
The number of practice reviews that CS4472 will have this semester is ANSWER
The per cent of the total mark allocated for all the quizzes is ANSWER
The per cent of the total mark allocated for all the weekly practices is ANSWER
The per cent of the total mark allocated for all the practice reviews is ANSWER
The practice technique advocated in this class is a modification of the ANSWER
A main theme behind the practice technique advocated in this class is that in order to improve your programming, ANSWER
questions.answer: you need data about your past programming

questions.question: A common piece of information for people interested in programmer productivity to track is ANSWER
answer: number of lines of code written

questions.question: Although we often think of programs as taking inputs and producing outputs, a higher level view of what is going on is to think of the programs as ANSWER about how to take inputs and produce outputs.
The scripts that were designed to aid the practice process assume that you will be uploading a copy of your work to BitBucket every time you ANSWER
questions.answer: record a note about your practice progress

questions.question: The protocols for practice expect that the longest amount of time that you will practice before recording a note is ANSWER
The total amount of practice time you can get credit for during a practice week is ANSWER
The four phases of testing (according to Whittaker) are: 1) modeling the software environment, 2) selecting test cases, 3) running and checking test cases, and 4) ANSWER
questions.answer: checking how well the testing is going

questions.question: The testing technique called boundary value partition starts with the notion of breaking the space of inputs into ANSWER
Structural testing is another name for ANSWER
The kind of testing we do to make sure that when we change a program we do not break something that used to work is called ANSWER
Using combinatorial testing, if I have 10 binary inputs, I only need to use ANSWER test cases (each a setting of each of the 10 inputs) to expect to find 98 per cent of the errors in the program.

The ANSWER is a method developed by Watt S. Humphrey to help individuals improve their programming skills based on existing methods that had been developed to help organizations improve their product development capabilities.
